title: Halloween Horror - Music Pack - Volume 1
description: A pack of 9 themes, loops and stems of Horror & Halloween-themed audio delights!
longDescription:
Perfect for anything with a Horror/Halloween feel, a mixture of dark and serious themes and lighter, more Gothic-esque Halloween playfulness. With harpsichord and pipe organ prevalent through many tracks, this pack is perfect for anything with a Gothic Horror vibe but in places, fun enough for a lighter Halloween feel. Each theme comes with loopable stems for in-game adaptive experimentation...


*** This pack is also included in the Mighty MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 along with eleven other albums and assorted goodies at an amazing discounted price. Click HERE to check it out! ***


Please feel free to let me know about your project if it features my music so I can share and promote your game.


The Halloween Horror Music Pack - Volume 1 by Ethan Lewis Maltby is an epic pack of exciting, orchestral tracks written for any project involving Horror/Halloween and pumpkins. Includes full themes perfect for menus and loopable stems for in-game action.


HALLOWEEN HORROR MUSIC PACK - Overview

- NINE main full tracks of spooky, horrific, playful, gothic, pipe organ, harpsichord, choir themes: LISTEN HERE

- 10 sets of stems based off each theme which can be used for creating an adaptive score. Hear an example of how these stems are broken down HERE


MAIN THEMES

1 - Dr. Acula - [02:37] + 3 Stems & End Sting

2 - It Comes In Night - [02:37] + 3 Stems & End Sting

3 - Creepy Doll - [02:04] + 3 Stems & End Sting

4 - Juice of the Beetle - [02:28] + 6 Stems & End Sting

5 - Haunted House Sneak - [02:00] + 3 Stems & End Sting

6 - Sawing - [02:07] + 3 Stems & End Sting

7 - Creeking Jonathan - [02:03] + 3 Stems & End Sting

8 - Rockstar Demon - [02:09] + 3 Stems & End Sting

9 - A Macabre Dance - [01:51] + 3 Stems & End Sting
technicalDetails:
Features:

- All themes are FULLY LOOPABLE for total flexibility

- 20 Minutes of Fully Mastered themes ready for import

- THREE stems per loop to build each track plus an ENDING sting

- Professional Quality wav files, 16bit/44.1khz

- Composed and Produced by a musician with two decades of professional experience in Film, TV, Sporting Events and Theatre.


Number of Audio Wavs: 52

Number of Audio Cues: 52

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1khz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 29:40

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Additional Notes:

Please do let me know if you use my work on any of your games so I can share and promote.

For any questions, enquiries or if you are interested in collaborations or commissions, please feel free to contact me and for more information about my work, please visit my website.
